resources.string: By using this app you agree to accept the following Limitation of Liability and Disclaimer of Warranty:\n You agree to use the information shown by this app as is, as you see fit, and entirely at your own risk. You further accept that your particular situation may not be entirely suited to the use of this information provided by this app and therefore you agree to use the app with the understanding and acceptance that the benefit derived by you from the use of this app may or may not be optimal. The creator of this app makes no representations or warranties with respect to the accuracy or completeness of the parking information shown by this app or any other information contained within the app and he specifically disclaims any implied warranties of merchandability or fitness for any particular purpose and shall in no event be liable for any loss to you (either personal, commercial or non-commercial), or loss of profit, or any kind of damage to you or your property, including but not limited to physical, mental, special, incidental, consequential, or other damages. This app is NOT endorsed by MCGM or BEST.

Contains data provided by Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai (MCGM) and Brihanmumbai Electric Supply Unit (BEST), and user submissions which may refer to privately operated public-parking facilities.\nMCGM and BEST operated lot data has been sourced from the MCGM website (data link provided on the Play store page)
CAUTION!\nYou are within 500 meters of a public parking lot. STEEP FINES may apply for parking in no-parking zones.
